title: Silhouette

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Mask the true intent of one of your allies. They will gain detection immunity and can disguise themselves as any role to appear for investigative effects. The effect lasts three days.
- Weave a path of darkness to a target's house. Those who visit Stalkers tonight will instead visit your target. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - While you're alive, all your fellow Stalkers' visits will use Astral. This won't apply to *you*, though.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who object to the presence of the Stalkers.

desc:
Post 2474
*"I feel like I'm being watched. But no matter where I look, all I see is darkness." ... "Maybe that's what's watching you."*
